pageContext.claim: “The Real Polls are starting to look GREAT! We will be having an even bigger victory than that of 2016. The Radical Left Anarchists, Agitators, Looters, and just plain Lunatics, will not be happy, but they will behave!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump regularly criticizes polling that he sees as not favorable. Internal polling done by the Trump campaign may have shown a closer spread, but the polling gurus at FiveThirtyEight’s analysis of all public polls, which are very “real,” had the president trailing Joe Biden by more than seven points.
